passage.text: C Box plots showing relative expression levels of top classifier genes in our RT-PCR dataset. Displayed are inverse deltaCt values (zero minus ΔCt), such that higher values indicate higher expression levels for each sample in this study.

Figure 5. Classification performance on external datasets ROC curves visualizing the classification performance of our 4-gene and 15-gene set models on external microarray datasets in both HIV- and HIV co-infected individuals. Left panels, 4-gene signature; right panels, 15-gene signature. Upper row shows classification performance between TB and healthy in HIV- populations; lower row in HIV co-infected populations. Numbers in parentheses are AUC values. For detailed classification measurements refer to Table 1.
